html: 3.23.21  7:23 am   If you were given an hour to write song that's at least 3 minutes long, do you think you would you be able to pull it off and be happy with the result?
3.23.21  6:50 am   3.22.21 2:53 pm Did you record the 125 BPM song before or after "here comes the sun", if you have recorded it at all?

3.23.21  5:22 am   7.19.16 4:12 pm How can you estimate how long a song will be before even actually recording it

     and not even finishing to write some (maybe most) of it?

3.23.21  4:44 am   in your song 'at the airport terminal,' is the line "and i'm eating porridge but i've heated it for the wrong amount of time" an allegory?

     if yes, what do you actually mean by it?
3.23.21  4:18 am   i told my dad about an idea i had for something and he said it didn't make sense ,.. that made me want to do it much much more. is that bad or just a bit of reverse psychology?
3.23.21  2:07 am   why you made might quit

3.22.21  11:25 pm   I am afraid that if I learn about music theory, music might lose some magic. Like instead of liking a song I think "oh wow its 'xyz' again, how derivative" instead of dancing.

irrational? thanks
3.22.21  10:37 pm   i seem to have misplaced my purpose, have you seen it anywhere?
3.22.21  10:28 pm   what should i do when i am haunted by all the foolish things i have done and said?

3.22.21  9:50 pm   why do people sometimes make worse songs than what they've made before, but then seem to always eventually make something really good and possibly better than anything yet once again?

     is it unreasonable for me to always be fearing that the next thing I make won't be as good?
3.22.21  8:23 pm   When did you start making "here comes the sun"?
3.22.21  6:50 pm   what's not art?
3.22.21  6:39 pm   how does it make you feel to hear that you inspire people?
3.22.21  6:07 pm   where can i go to be cool

3.22.21  3:06 pm   i like your axiom that any writing job can always be finished. but how do you handle the feeling that, for some writing jobs, it seems that the only way to finish the job (in a reasonable amount of time) is to accept writing that hurts in your soul and feels bad because it feels so much worse than the parts of the writing job that give you all the good feels? this is what troubles me. i have some song fragments that feel very strong to me, but i suffer a lot when i try to write more but get the exact opposite of feel goods about the new writing.
3.22.21  2:53 pm   What BPM is the new song?
3.22.21  1:36 pm   How do you motivate yourself do to things that you find difficult to do?
3.22.21  1:32 pm   Does the brick floor have context?

3.22.21  1:10 pm   In "At the airport terminal" after the first "the planes are landing" did the shwsheewshwshwwshw sound come straight from your mouth or did you use the computer to make your mouth sounds sound cooler?

3.22.21  1:05 pm   In your lyrics, do you always imagine yourself as the character singing?

     For example, the triangle guy is it you or another character?
3.22.21  11:39 am   What excites you most in life right now/what are you looking forward to?
3.22.21  9:55 am   why does the sun have to set sometimes?
3.22.21  7:58 am   How to get to where I'm going to?
3.22.21  7:25 am   how do I deal with something I did that was too weird/cringe/impulsive, but it was not something a long time ago, it's like just happened
3.22.21  5:36 am   what are your thoughts/feelings on listening to a playlist of songs on shuffle
3.22.21  5:02 am   Would you consider your music making a career or a hobby?
3.22.21  1:58 am   When was airport terminal written?
3.21.21  11:46 pm   how do i go to sleep
3.21.21  11:39 pm   have you ever considered doing a cover of a song (not like the ones on the "jazz" page)?
3.21.21  11:13 pm   when singing i often start the note a scale degree below, then rise to it after an eighth note or so. is this a bad habit?
3.21.21  10:43 pm   are all of your 3d objects custom-made by you or are the more complex ones like the piano premade models?

3.21.21  10:22 pm   Have you thought about a video including both 2D and 3D?

     I'm not even sure if that's possible, but it sounds cool nonetheless! If you are thinking about doing that, I hope it goes well! :)
3.21.21  10:06 pm   What rhymes with sun?
3.21.21  8:41 pm   have any thoughts or ideas in 2021?
3.21.21  8:35 pm   how to stave off depression, nihilism, and the inevitable fact that everything we do is entirely arbitrary and meaningless in the big picture?
3.21.21  7:52 pm   are there any monkey heads in your upcoming video
3.21.21  7:30 pm   when's the new song coming out
3.21.21  7:29 pm   did you make a lot of bad songs before you got good?
3.21.21  6:20 pm   how did i get here
3.21.21  5:31 pm   how to motivation
3.21.21  4:52 pm   what is your favourite number
3.21.21  3:47 pm   Why do you have such a small amount of songs in minor scales?
3.21.21  2:27 pm   Did you learn how to drive to the mall in driving school?
3.21.21  12:12 pm   how did you highlight the globe for hotewig? on a 2d map, you mask the section and change the hue. in order to project the map onto the globe, do you need to do a UV mapping?
3.21.21  10:04 am   will you please give us an anagram of the new song's title?
3.21.21  7:58 am   are fridges real?
3.21.21  6:07 am   is it wishful thinking to hope for your new music video to be released next tuesday
3.21.21  5:42 am   What made you decide to combine a stock image of railroad tracks with a colorful cartoony train and the word "train" at the beginning of the "long long long journey" video?
